publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3304 Sandra White: BBC Refusal to Help in Humanitarian Appeal for Gaza—That the Parliament condemns the decision by the BBC, a publicly funded body, not to air the appeal by the Disasters Emergency Committee (DEC) for humanitarian aid for Gaza; notes that ITV and channels 4 and 5 will air this appeal and commends them for doing so; considers that refusing to air this appeal leaves the BBC in a minority and brings into question the independence of the BBC, and draws attention to the fact that people who wish to contribute to the DEC Gaza Crisis Appeal can do so by contacting DEC on 0370 60 60 900 or at DEC Gaza Crisis, PO Box 999, London, EC3A 3AA or by visiting www.dec.org.uk. Supported by: Bill Wilson*, Rob Gibson*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Pauline McNeill*, Alasdair Allan*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Bashir Ahmad*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Stuart McMillan*, Bill Kidd*, Christopher Harvie*, Patricia Ferguson*, Bob Doris*

S3M-3304 BBC Refusal to Help in Humanitarian Appeal for Gaza (lodged on 26 January 2009) Roseanna Cunningham*, Elaine Smith*, Jamie Hepburn*, Gil Paterson*, Cathy Peattie*, Alex Neil*, Christine Grahame*
